vote.text: Amendment SA 4056 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4056 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3811-3812, S3812-3814, S3817; text: CR S3811-3812) To improve section 412 and section 926.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4056 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3739.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4056 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
